longBusinessSummary: Sydbank A/S, together with its subsidiaries, provides various banking products and services to corporate, private, retail, and institutional clients in Denmark and internationally. The company operates in Banking, Asset Management, Sydbank Markets, Treasury, and Other segments. The company offers various deposits, and loans and advances; and corporate banking services, including financing solutions and advisory services; leasing solutions to businesses; and international commercial banking services, such as payment and cash management solutions. It also provides private banking products and services, such as advisory services related to pensions, investments, and various financial issues. In addition, the company offers advisory and asset management services for investment funds, pooled pension plans, foundations, institutional clients, and wealthy customers; investment management solutions; economic research and equity research; professional advisory services, such as financial planning, insurance, housing, pension, and mortgage credit services to retail clients; and advice and quotes prices as regards bonds, shares, and foreign exchange, as well as undertakes market-making obligations for institutional clients, central banks, asset managers, foreign and other clients, and banks. Further, it offers mortgage bonds, cash letter services, various payment solutions, international cash management services, and trade finance services. The company was founded in 1986 and is headquartered in Aabenraa, Denmark.
